The Little Mermaid: I would bring the Little Mermaid to life because I've always been fascinated by the idea of mermaids and their magical underwater world. I would love to explore the ocean and discover the secrets of the deep sea.

Harry Potter: I would bring Harry Potter to life because I've always been a fan of the series and the magical world of Hogwarts. I would love to learn spells and potions and explore the magical creatures and beings that exist in the Harry Potter universe.

The Lion King: I would bring The Lion King to life because I've always been a fan of the movie and the story of Simba's journey to becoming king. I would love to experience the beauty and majesty of the African savannah and learn about the circle of life.

Beauty and the Beast: I would bring Beauty and the Beast to life because I've always been a fan of the classic fairy tale and the love story between Belle and the Beast. I would love to explore the enchanted castle and discover the magic that exists within it.

Alice in Wonderland: I would bring Alice in Wonderland to life because I've always been fascinated by the idea of a world where nothing is as it seems. I would love to explore the whimsical world of Wonderland and discover the secrets that lie within.
